name: Cuentas por Cobrar del Cliente
query:
SELECT
    DISTINCT
    s.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:80",
    s.customer  AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    s.customer_name  AS "Customer Name:Data:200",
    s.voucher_type AS "Voucher Type:Data:110",
s.voucher_no  AS "Voucher No:Dynamic Link/Voucher No:120",
    s.due_date  AS "Due Date:Date:80",
    s.status  AS "status:Data:200",
    s.outstanding_amount  AS "outstanding amount:Currency/currency:160",
    s.moneda_cuenta  AS "moneda_cuenta:Data:200",
    s.credit  AS "Total Invoiced Amount:Currency/currency:140",
    s.debit  AS "Total Paid Amount:Currency/currency:140",
    s.outstanding as "Total Outstanding Amount:Currency/currency:160",
    s.age as "Age (Days):Int:80",
    ifnull(CASE WHEN s.age <= 30 THEN s.outstanding ELSE 0.0 END, 0.0) AS "0-30:Currency/currency:100",
    ifnull(CASE WHEN s.age > 30 AND s.age <= 60 THEN s.outstanding ELSE 0.0 END, 0.0) AS "30-60:Currency/currency:100",
    ifnull(CASE WHEN s.age > 60 AND s.age <= 90 THEN s.outstanding ELSE 0.0 END, 0.0) AS "60-90:Currency/currency:100",
    ifnull(CASE WHEN s.age > 90 THEN s.outstanding ELSE 0.0 END, 0.0) AS "90-above:Currency/currency:100",
    s.territory  AS "Territory:Link/Territory:80",
    s.remarks AS "Remarks:Data:200"
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT
    `tabGL Entry`.`posting_date`,
    `tabCustomer`.`name` as customer,
    `tabCustomer`.`customer_name`,
    `tabGL Entry`.`voucher_type`,
    `tabGL Entry`.`voucher_no`,
    `tabSales Invoice`.`due_date`,
    `tabSales Invoice`.`status`,
    `tabSales Invoice`.`outstanding_amount`,
    (select account_currency from `tabAccount` where name=`tabSales Invoice`.debit_to) as moneda_cuenta,
    ifnull(`tabGL Entry`.`credit`, 0.0) as credit,
    ifnull(`tabGL Entry`.`debit`, 0.0) as debit,
    ifnull(`tabGL Entry`.`credit`, 0.0) - ifnull(`tabGL Entry`.`debit`, 0.0) as outstanding,
    CASE %(ageing_based_on)s
       WHEN "Posting Date" THEN
          DATEDIFF(DATE(%(report_date)s), `tabSales Invoice`.`posting_date`)
       WHEN "Due Date" THEN
          DATEDIFF(%(report_date)s, `tabSales Invoice`.`due_date`)
    END as age,
    `tabCustomer`.`territory`,
    `tabGL Entry`.`remarks`
FROM `tabCustomer`
INNER JOIN `tabGL Entry` ON `tabCustomer`.`name` = `tabGL Entry`.`against`
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice` ON 
    `tabSales Invoice`.`name` = `tabGL Entry`.`voucher_no` 
    AND `tabGL Entry`.`voucher_type` = "Sales Invoice"
WHERE `tabSales Invoice`.`posting_date` <= %(report_date)s AND `tabSales Invoice`.`company` = 'IBW-NI' 
and `tabGL Entry`.`against` = %(customer)s and `tabSales Invoice`.`docstatus`<>2
GROUP BY `tabCustomer`.`name`, `tabGL Entry`.`voucher_no`
ORDER BY `tabCustomer`.`customer_name` ASC) s
